prompts: Create a playful fire-type Pokemon that loves to dance and has a vibrant orange fur.
Generate a character that embodies the spirit of adventure with fiery powers and a cute face.
Imagine a mischievous monkey Pokemon with a fiery personality and a unique style.
Show me a Pokemon that combines a love for fire and an energetic demeanor in its design.
Make a unique Pokemon that has a wild appearance and excels in fiery battles.
Design a fire-themed Pokemon that radiates warmth and has sweet, expressive eyes.
Give me an illustration of a spunky fire-type Pokemon with a charming smile and a bold attitude.

distinctive_features: Flame-like tuft of hair on top of the head
Expressive face with a playful smile
